attributes.action: Make it illegal to discriminate against or harass a breast/bottle feeding parent
attributes.additional_details:
I am asking for your support to make it illegal to harass or discriminate against a feeding parent. They should not be asked to move or use the toilets. It is quite possible to feed discreetly whilst in full public view.

It really is time to sort this out once and for all. We have all been babies, babies are the future. Their needs  and nurturing, must come before any persons inability to deal with their own immature sensibilities.

Generally speaking, it is in everyone's interests that the baby is fed -  a well fed baby is quiet, content and soon falls asleep causing the minimum disturbance to all around.
